message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it presents significant value for that price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay that price for the value it presents.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is quite high.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but no higher. Can we meet at that price?
